title: Boss Nix Quickfingers
atAGlance:
**Boss Nix Quickfingers** - The Swarm Lord

- Goblin captain commanding the LARGEST fleet by ship count‚Äî30+ vessels
- The catch: they're all small. Sloops, cutters, skiffs, boats other captains would dismiss
- Swarm tactics make thirty small ships deadlier than one big one
- Manic, chaotic, fast-talking‚Äîand surprisingly effective
- *Common saying: "They laughed at his boats. Then thirty boats showed up at once."*

| | |
|---|---|
| **Age** | 29 |
| **Race** | Goblin |
| **Role** | Swarm Fleet Commander |
| **Fleet** | 30+ small vessels |
| **Base** | Skarath / Freehold Harbor |

---
commonKnowledge:
### Appearance & Manner
Small even for a goblin (3'2"). Wiry, constantly in motion, can't sit still. Pale green skin, huge yellow darting eyes, enormous twitching ears. Wears an oversized captain's coat (stolen, too big, doesn't care). Long nimble fingers always fidgeting. Manic grin like he knows a joke no one else gets.

### Personality
Never stops moving. Talks fast, thinks faster. Five plans running simultaneously. Attention span of a caffeinated squirrel. Exhausting to be around. "More is always better" is his philosophy. Thirty ships? Why not fifty? Numbers, numbers, numbers.

### The Swarm Fleet
- 30+ small vessels (fluctuates constantly)
- Each carries 8-15 goblins
- ~400 crew across the fleet
- All from Skarath goblin families
- Fast, maneuverable, expendable, NUMEROUS

### Swarm Tactics
Against large ships: fifteen small ships surround, attack from all directions, board before they can respond. Can't fight them all at once. Death by a thousand cuts. If losing, scatter in thirty directions‚Äîenemy can only chase a few.

### Famous Maneuver: "The Net"
Circle target with fifteen+ boats. Throw grappling hooks from all sides. Board from every direction. Whole attack takes under ten minutes.

### Known Relationships
- **The Storm:** Absolutely terrified. Has ordered fleet to NEVER approach *Sorrow*. "Some fights you run."
- **The Rapier:** Mutual amusement. Different styles, same cockiness.
- **The Admiral:** Contempt from Kozrek‚Äî"undisciplined rabble." Nix escaped his trap once and bought five new boats with the profit.

---
secretKnowledge:
### True Nature
The manic exterior hides sharp cunning. Coordinating thirty ships requires intelligence most don't credit him with. He knows exactly where every vessel is, tracks complex logistics, and plans multiple contingencies. Underestimating him is a mistake many have made once.

### Why It Works
- **Cheap:** Can replace losses easily
- **Fast:** Outrun what they can't fight
- **Nimble:** Go places big ships can't
- **Numerous:** Overwhelm through count
- **Disposable:** Losing one isn't catastrophic

### The Skarath Connection
Nix is from Skarath, the goblin shipbuilding center. His family builds ships. He buys at discount. This is why he can maintain such a large fleet‚Äîwholesale prices from relatives. Threatening Skarath threatens his entire operation.

### Revenue Streams
- Standard piracy (cargo)
- Transport for hire (move things quietly)
- Scouting services (nobody watches waters like Nix)
- Salvage operations (quick to reach wrecks)
- Smuggling (small ships, hidden coves)

### Goblin Logic
- "Fair fight" means you planned poorly
- Overwhelming force is the only force
- Running away is valid tactic
- Survival beats honor
- Profit over pride

### What He Wants
- More ships (always more)
- Fifty ships would be nice
- Respect despite the jokes
- His family's prosperity

### What He Fears
- The Storm (sensibly)
- Storms (weather‚Äîsmall ships are vulnerable)
- Losing coordination (thirty ships need communication)
- Something hunting his ships (pirates don't just vanish...)

### Story Hooks

| Hook | Description |
|------|-------------|
| **The Blockade** | Need to break a naval blockade? Nix's swarm is perfect distraction. |
| **Missing Ships** | Several boats disappeared. Pirates don't just vanish. What's hunting them? |
| **The Expansion** | Nix wants fifty ships. His moves threaten other captains' territories. |
| **The Race** | Bet between Nix and The Rapier‚Äîwho reaches a point first? Stakes are high. |
| **Goblin Family Drama** | Conflict in Skarath threatens ship supply. He needs to solve family problems. |
| **The Salvage** | Nix found something in a wreck. Something valuable. Something others want. |
